properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. VESSEL PRIVA SEA IV, SIX PERSONS ON BOARD,
   TAKING ON WATER IN 18-40.24N 044-08.53W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO RSC SAN JUAN,
   PHONE: 787 289 2041,
   E-MAIL: SSJCC@USCG.MIL OR RCC MIAMI,
   E-MAIL: RCCMIAMI@USCG.MIL.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 4005/17.
